key.name: last-source
key.description: The identifier of the last selected source.

key.name: apod-api-key
key.description:
The API key to use for requests to the APOD API.
The default key is usually fine, but if you find that you are rate-limited, you may wish to use your own API key, which you can obtain free of charge at https://api.nasa.gov/.

key.name: disabled-collections
key.description: Collections from St√•lenhag which to ignore.
